legal_basis: Section 15 of the Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms
decision_reasoning: restricts Band Council positions to resident members
perpetuating stereotypes that non-residents are less capable or interested in governance
lacks sufficient evidence for financial necessity
charter_rights: prohibits discrimination based on enumerated or analogous grounds
application_details: Non-resident members challenged the 2011 Code's residency restrictions as discriminatory under the Charter
procedure_followed: Judicial review of the 2011 Code's adoption and application
result_of_case: The court found the 2011 Code unconstitutional and ordered further submissions on remedy
